truyen.the_loai: Drama, Mature, Romance, Seinen, Webtoons
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhwa - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: Marriage is in shambles. But still their pride stops them from seeking each other. Thats when both drift out to get the taste of some 'Drugcandy' (adultery). A tale of two people exploring out of their relationship.

truyen.the_loai: Action, Comedy, Drama, Ecchi, Romance, School life, Shounen., Supernatural, Webtoons
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhwa - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: The story of a boy and girl whose lives were one day entwined by red string. Literally.

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Drama, Ecchi, Mature, Romance, Seinen, Smut, Supernatural, Webtoons
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhwa - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: 19 years old she vs 31 years old she. Is she two individuals? The childhood version of her came beyond time to meet her boyfriend. The current girlfriend and young girlfriend faces confusion and bewilderment?

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Gender bender, Romance, School life, Shoujo.
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhua - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: The curse of twelve stars, a girl who plays piano with a dream of becoming a chef, because of an odd job that she pretends to be a boy. What's waiting for Yue Hui is a mysterious mansion and 12 boys who have the curse of 12 stars which fall upon each of them. What's awaiting her? Where are her and the boys' destiny leading to? A love song for 1000 years, the legend of 12 beautiful stars, everything is in?Starry Night Club?

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Shoujo., Supernatural
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhua - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Poverty-strikened Yang Jinghua dies in an accident. The moment he wakes up, he seems ten years younger. At first, Yang Jinghua thought he was reborn. However a white-haired, rich and handsome man, named Duanmu Xi, reveals the truth. In order to stay in the world, Yang Jinghua must become Duanmu Xi's soul image and therefore, creates a soul contract that binds both their souls.

truyen.the_loai: Ecchi, Harem, Romance, School life, Shoujo.
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhua - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Jiang Hao, a normal, high school student who is extremely scared of getting into trouble suddenly becomes the Harem King of his school and gets confessed to by a bunch of beautiful girls! The worst thing is, Jiang hao doesn't know any of the girls who confessed to him! What on earth is happening? This is a manga that shouldn't be missed by fans of the harem genre!

truyen.ten: star wars: the last jedi adaptation
truyen.the_loai: Movies - tv, Sci-fi
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.ten_truyen: star wars: the last jedi adaptation
truyen.gioi_thieu: The Resistance has found Luke Skywalker! But the First Order is hot on their tail... and they are out for blood. Join writer Gary Whitta (ROGUE ONE: A STAR WARS STORY) and artist Michael Walsh (STAR WARS ANNUAL, HAWKEYE and THE VISION) as they take on the adventures of Force prodigy Rey, ace pilot Poe Dameron, and ex-First Order recruit Finn from the hit blockbuster STAR WARS: THE LAST JEDI - featuring never-before-seen scenes of your favorite characters!

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Post-apocalyptic
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.tac_gia: Terry Mayo, Chris Hall, Lucas Romero, Brandon DeStefano
truyen.gioi_thieu: Biological warfare has decimated the earth's population, leaving two distinct groups of survivors in its wake. In San Diego, four teenage brothers rescue a young girl from a brutal gang of psychopaths and spark a chain of events that attracts an onslaught of unspeakable evil. This is the world of the Wicked and the Righteous... and the children will lead them all.

truyen.the_loai: Fantasy, Sci-fi
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: When a fleet of spaceships crashes into northern Europe in 956 AD, a group of unlikely Viking heroes are the last line of defense against a brutal intergalactic warlord. Equal parts science fiction and fantasy, The Spider King follows the adventures of Viking warriors as they defend their world against alien invaders armed with futuristic technology and impossible weapons.

truyen.the_loai: Action, Fantasy, Horror, Mature, Sci-fi, Seinen, Supernatural
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Set in a ruined world overrun with chimerical creatures where the female creatures eat the males. Two creatures explore the land: Usagi, the elder sister, protects her brother Mitsuki, a curious chronicler who is able to read the books in their secret hiding place to know that the world was once different.

truyen.the_loai: Action, Drama, Ecchi, Harem, Martial arts, Mature, Romance, School life, Shounen.
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Mikado High School trains the best students to be the best mercenary bodyguards. But Morito Hayama, a merc escort student with no rank whatsoever, is suddenly assigned to guard a person so highly valued that no escort has ever survived before. Will his subject survive the experience? Will HE survive?!

truyen.the_loai: Drama, Fantasy, Sci-fi, Shoujo., Slice of life, Tragedy
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Yukinari was abandoned as an infant, but fortunately a loving family adopted him. Perhaps because of this, he has an affinity for helpless, abandoned creatures and goes out of his way to help them. One night, Yukinari and his friends witness a falling star hit the ground and rush to the spot where it hit, only to find a child cradled in the meteorite, surrounded by a field of roses?!

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Superhero
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: SPIDER-MAN RETURNS TO THE FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD! The webslinging, wallcrawling wonder returns to New York City in the all-new PETER PARKER: THE SPECTACULAR SPIDER-MAN. A companion series to the best-selling Amazing Spider-Man series, Peter Parker is going back-to-basics for big heroics in the Big Apple. Featuring adversaries old and new, be there as Spider-Man returns to his friendly neighborhood for his never ending battle against crime and the dreaded "Parker Luck".

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Superhero
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.tac_gia: James Tynion IV, Ryan Benjamin, Jim Lee
truyen.gioi_thieu: There is a secret history to the DC Universe of heroes who have protected humanity from the shadows since the dawn of time... and who can live forever. Enter the Immortal Men! The team, headed by the Immortal Man, has waged a secret war against the House of Conquest for countless years-but Conquest has dealt a devastating blow. When their base of operations, known as the Campus, is savagely attacked, the Immortal Men must seek out their last hope-an emerging metahuman known as Caden Park! Caden's emerging powers may be able to ensure the Immortal Men's survival-but will Conquest get to him first?

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Superhero
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: DID YOU EVER WANT TO BE DEADPOOL??? Now's your chance! This series is not JUST the most amazing comic book you've ever read... it's also a role-playing adventure! YOU decide what choices Deadpool makes!

truyen.the_loai: Action, Drama, Martial arts, Mature, School life, Seinen
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.tac_gia: Murata Shinya, Sayazaki Isuka, Hakozaki Isuka, Hayami Tokisada
truyen.gioi_thieu: Possessing both flexibility and tenacity, Imomushi (Japanese for Caterpillar) is an assassin that does not kill anyone but those who are assigned to her. She seems to have had something happen between her and her older sister in the past, however. A new spin-off story from the same author of Arachnid, this story looks at the inner workings of a top assassin within The Organization itself.

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Shounen., Slice of life, Supernatural
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: A school comedy involving the lazy angel Gabriel and her friends.

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Romance, School life, Seinen, Shounen., Slice of life
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: The story of the protagonist, Tomoya, and his everyday life with his girlfriend Yuiko-san.

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Superhero
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.tac_gia: Tony Patrick, Scott Snyder, Cully Hamner, Laura Martin
truyen.gioi_thieu: Batman may own the night, but with new villains emerging during the day he needs an ally to defend the city when he can't. Only one teen is up to the challenge, Duke Thomas. After months of training, he's ready to step out of the shadow of the bat to become his own kind of hero. Meet Gotham City's newest protector: The Signal! Spinning out of adventures in ALL-STAR BATMAN and WE ARE ROBIN, comics superstar Scott Snyder and newcomer Tony Patrick take our young hero to new heights in this exciting miniseries with artwork by Cully Hamner.

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Fanservice, Leading ladies
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: In this riveting relaunch, the guardian of the jungle, SHEENA, pursues a mysterious invader that has come to spy on the Amazon's most ancient secrets... Following the path of the trespasser, she encounters a forbidden ruin in which even more deadly dangers lie in wait and begins an adventure that will take her beyond her wildest imaginings!

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Superhero
truyen.kieu_truyen: Comic - read from left to right
truyen.tac_gia: Dan Abnett, Lan Medina, Richard Friend, Veronica Gandini
truyen.gioi_thieu: From the pages of AQUAMAN comes a brand-new adventure starring Mera, in her own title for the first time ever! As the brutal Atlantean Civil War rages, Mera must keep the peace between the surface world and Atlantis as its newly anointed queen in exile. But when Aquaman's brother Orm, a.k.a. Ocean Master, learns of his homeland's fate, he'll stop at nothing to return to Atlantis as its king and savior!

truyen.the_loai: Comedy, Romance, School life, Shoujo ai, Sports
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Yamada is the plant appointee; tending the school's garden of flowers on her own. She isn't the slightest bit athletic, she's actually quite clumsy. However, that doesn't stop her from having feelings for the star athlete in the class next-door, Kase-san. Slightly shy, Yamada is reluctant about her feelings for the enthusiastic Kase-san. Slowly but surely, the pair are helping each other to grow in confidence for both themselves and their budding relationship, each blush and brush of the hand at a time.

truyen.the_loai: 4 koma, Shounen.
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: The lonely high school girl - Misuzu, with the perverted young man - Shoutaro's cooperation (obstruction), take up the challenge of making friends together!

truyen.the_loai: Action, Fantasy, Seinen, Shounen.
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manga - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: The story revolves around Tsunashi, the child of royalty who was left behind in the lost kingdom of Karan. He is expected by those around him to awaken his great powers that sleep within him in order to revive the kingdom - but rather than fighting, Tsunan enjoys playing in the world of books. However, he must become serious soon, as a new army is threatening to invade Karan.

truyen.ten: why did you come to my home
truyen.the_loai: Drama, Romance, Slice of life, Webtoons
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhwa - read from left to right
truyen.ten_truyen: why did you come to my home
truyen.gioi_thieu: The unfamiliar guy who appeared in front of Suh Jaehee, the office worker with a busy life. Remove prejudices against him!

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Drama, Historical, Martial arts, Shounen., Webtoons
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhwa - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: Set during the Goryeo military regime, a hero that arises from a slave to be reborn as a general.

truyen.the_loai: Adult, Comedy, Ecchi, Harem, Mature, Shounen., Sports, Webtoons
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhwa - read from left to right
truyen.gioi_thieu: Sweaty woman is beautiful! Martial arts, swimming, cycling, athletics, health, sticky... The girls of exercise and sexy Sports

truyen.the_loai: Action, Adventure, Sci-fi, Shounen.
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhua - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: What our protagonist Neil enjoys doing everyday is loudly preaching what his father had seen above the Cloud Sea. Nobody believed that it was true, and all say that his father was a liar who deceives the public to gain fame. In order to prove that his father wasn't lying, Neil resolved to break through the obstruction of the Cloud Sea and find out the truth! On his journey, he discovered that the Cloud Sea's existence was actually huge conspiracy devised by Genians, and his companion seemed to be a friend, but also an enemy...

truyen.the_loai: Drama, Mature, Mystery, Psychological, Seinen
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhua - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Easy Going Scans The grave of Zhang Chunan's long-dead grandfather was desecrated by a group of mysterious people, but his grandfather's corpse wasn't the only thing they dug up. Secrets and mysteries surrounding the Zhang family began to surface, and Zhang Chunan is apparently more than just an ordinary college student desperate to be rid of his virginity.

truyen.the_loai: Action, Martial arts, School life, Shounen., Supernatural
truyen.kieu_truyen: Manhua - read from right to left
truyen.gioi_thieu: Top student Wang Fei has always dreamt about becoming a Judge, a pillar of light and justice for the people! However fate isn't on his side and he ends up going to a high school for delinquents. How is he going to survive? Will he rise to the top or be gobbled up in the chaos of the hell that is Shiji High School?
